column4: /var/log/messages has been disabled by default in ubuntu since 11.04
sweet, what file gets the logs that used to go there?

nearly everything that would have been in /var/log/messages should be in either /var/log/kern.log or /var/log/syslog (I don't know if anything is missing, although syslog is *.* so it should catch everything else now)
thanks for the catch, I am still on lucid
